ThirdParty.Name: X-CUBE-NFC4
ThirdParty.ShortDescription: Drivers and sample applications for NFC4 components

Note.Release: 1.4.0 : - First release of the NFC4 support package. - Create sample applications with STM32CubeMX V5.2.0 - This version is compatible with STM32CubeMX v5.2.0

ThirdParty.Name: X-CUBE-MEMS1
ThirdParty.ShortDescription: Drivers and sample applications for MEMS components

Note.Release: 6.1.0 : Create sample applications with STM32CubeMX V5.2.0 and upwards This release is not fully compatible with STM32CubeMX V4.27.0, STM32CubeMX V5.0.0, STM32CubeMX V5.0.1 and STM32CubeMX V5.1.0

ThirdParty.Name: X-CUBE-MEMS1
ThirdParty.ShortDescription: Drivers and sample applications for MEMS components

Note.Release: 6.0.0 : Create sample applications with STM32CubeMX V5.1.0 and upwards This release is not fully compatible with STM32CubeMX V4.27.0, STM32CubeMX V5.0.0 and STM32CubeMX V5.0.1 Add support to STM32G0 family Add support to X-NUCLEO-IKS01A3

ThirdParty.Name: X-CUBE-MEMS1
ThirdParty.ShortDescription: Drivers and sample applications for MEMS components

Note.Release: 5.2.1 : Create sample applications with STM32CubeMX V5.0.0 and upwards This release is not fully compatible with STM32CubeMX V4.27.0 STM32G0 family not supported yet Fix issue in the rounding of temperature values in DataLogTerminal and IKS01A2_DataLogTerminal applications

ThirdParty.Name: X-CUBE-GNSS1
ThirdParty.ShortDescription: GNSS Drivers, Library and sample applications for the Teseo LiV3-F module

Note.Release: 3.0.0 : GNSS support package V3.0.0 - This version is compatible with STM32CubeMX V5.2.x (not fully compatible with older releases) - Rework the Driver and the Middleware - Update implementation of FWUpdater application

ThirdParty.Name: X-CUBE-BLE1
ThirdParty.ShortDescription: BLE stack and sample applications for BlueNRG-MS module

Note.Release: 4.4.0 : BlueNRG-MS support package V4.4.0 - This version is compatible with STM32CubeMX V5.2.x (not fully compatible with older releases) - Create sample applications with STM32CubeMX V5.2.x - Change HAL EXTI management in sample applications

ThirdParty.Name: X-CUBE-BLE1
ThirdParty.ShortDescription: BLE stack and sample applications for BlueNRG-MS module

Note.Release: 4.2.0 : BlueNRG-MS support package V4.2.0 - Create sample applications with STM32CubeMX V5.0.0 - Add BLE Advertising, Scan and Connection parameters configuration through STM32CubeMX GUI - Add SensorDemo_BLESensor-App sample application - Exclude support to STM32G0 family

ThirdParty.Name: X-CUBE-BLE1
ThirdParty.ShortDescription: BLE stack and sample applications for BlueNRG-MS module

Note.Release: 1.1.0 : BlueNRG-MS support package V1.1.0 - Create sample applications with STM32CubeMX V4.27.0 - Align to new BSP Common APIs - Update Getting Started document

3.4.0 : Artificial Intelligence Pack version 3.4.0 for STM32 Cortex M7 and M4 MCUs
Integrates support for Keras, Lasagne, Caffe and ConvNetJS neural networks What's new in this release: Bug fix and enhancements in the user interface Support of Depthwise 1D and Depthwise separable 1D Keras convolution Better support of Linux and MacOS
